HEADVISUAL.TEXT: Download now, add QR code and show your vaccination, health and test certificates digitally throughout the EU. Available now in the App Store and Playstore.

SECTION1.TEXT: Add your own vaccination or test certificates to the app and validate those of your friends, relatives and acquaintances.

SECTION2.TEXT: Scan and validate QR codes from across the European Union with the GreenPass app.

SECTION3.TEXT1: With the GreenPass app, you can now conveniently add your vaccination, testing and recovery certificates to your Apple Wallet or Android Wallet.

FAQ.PREHEADER: You still have some open questions?

FAQ_DATA.QUESTION: Which data is collected by the app?
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER1: All data (certificates consisting of first and last name, date of birth, and certificate-specific health data) is stored and processed exclusively
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER2: locally and offline on your device
FAQ_DATA.ANSWER3: , with the exception of the optional "Apple Wallet" feature. You can find all information on data protection summarized as compactly as possible in our
